quote_first: ‘Monsieur has well slept this morning,’ he said, smiling. ‘What o’clock is it, Victor?’ asked Dorian Gray, sleepily. ‘
title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
author: Oscar Wilde

quote_first: “Where are the ladies and Gentlemen?” asked Aleyn. “Sir, in the garding”, said Bunce. “What time’s lunch?” “
title: A Man Lay Dead
author: Ngaio Marsh

quote_first: The clock caught Miss LaFosse´s eye. ´Good heavens!´ she gasped. ´Look at the time.
quote_last: . You must be starved.‘ She turned impetuously to Miss Pettigrew.
title: Miss Pettigrew lives for a Day
author: Winifred Watson
